winner_reason: Game 6 delivers the most compelling twist execution with clearly visible concentric scoring zones that create strategic depth, while maintaining polished visuals and an immediately understandable risk/reward system that screams "one more try!"

agents.twist_desc: Catch multiple glowing fireflies in quick succession for multipliers.
agents.notes: The visuals are polished with nice glowing effects, but there's no visible combo counter or multiplier system to show the chain combo twist is actually implemented.

agents.twist_desc: Multiple colored fireflies (red, blue, green, yellow).
agents.notes: The game shows basic elements like hearts/lives and score, but the color match twist is poorly implemented - there's no clear target color indicator and only one visible firefly, making the core mechanic unclear.

agents.twist_desc: Fireflies come in 3 sizes: Tiny, Medium, Large.
agents.notes: This is just a start screen that explains the size hunt mechanic but doesn't show any actual gameplay, fireflies, or visual implementation of the three different sizes and their behaviors.

agents.twist_desc: Fireflies spawn at the top and FALL downward.
agents.notes: The gravity fall mechanic is clearly implemented with fireflies at different vertical positions falling downward, complete with score tracking and life system, though it could benefit from more visual feedback and particle effects to enhance the arcade excitement.

agents.twist_desc: Instead of tap, HOLD your finger on a firefly.
LOTS of tiny fireflies everywhere (20-30 on screen).
agents.notes: This is just a title screen with instructions - none of the actual "swarm drag" gameplay mechanics are implemented or visible, showing no fireflies, dragging, or trail effects.

agents.twist_desc: Screen divided into zones with different multipliers.
agents.notes: The zone multiplier twist is clearly implemented with visible concentric circles showing the different scoring zones, though the gameplay could benefit from more dynamic visual feedback when fireflies enter different zones.

agents.twist_desc: Fireflies pulse to a steady beat (around 120 BPM).
agents.notes: This is just a basic game over screen with no evidence of the rhythm/beat mechanics, fireflies, or any of the core twist features described.

agents.twist_desc: Red "hunter" fireflies spawn and chase the golden ones.
agents.notes: The core twist mechanic of red hunters chasing golden fireflies is missing - only showing two static golden fireflies without any predator threat or protection gameplay.

agents.twist_desc: Special rainbow/sparkly fireflies grant temporary powers:
agents.notes: This is just a title screen with basic instructions - the power-up frenzy twist mechanic isn't visible at all and there's no actual gameplay shown.
